explains: adj. 未受阻的；未被吓住的

sentences.en: Undeterred, he crept into the cemetery under the cloak of darkness with a bemused sculptor in tow.
sentences.cn: 他没有被吓住，在黑暗的掩护下，拖着一个困惑的雕刻家，蹑手蹑脚地走进墓地。

sentences.en: Migrating animals maintain an intense attentiveness to the greater mission, which keeps them undistracted by temptations and undeterred by challenges that would turn other animals aside.
sentences.cn: 迁徙动物对于更宏大的使命保持着高度专注，这一使命让它们不会被诱惑分散注意力，也不会被挑战吓倒，这些挑战可能会让其他动物转变方向。

sentences.en: Security guards intercepted him, but he was undeterred.
sentences.cn: 保卫截住了他，但是他并没被吓住。
